sentences.sContent: We should attend to the image in the expressional dimension has more abundant cerebration.
sentences.sContent_eng: We should attend to the image in the expressional dimension has more abundant cerebration.
sentences.sCn: 我们应该关注影像于表现的层面上有更丰富的思考。

sentences.sContent: Study philosophy and learn cerebration : train yourself to examine every concept, every truth.
sentences.sContent_eng: Study philosophy and learn cerebration : train yourself to examine every concept, every truth.
sentences.sCn: 研读哲学，学会思考：训练自己去检验每一个概念和事件的真伪。

synos.tran: 思考；精神活动；[心理]脑髓作用

trans.tranOther: the act of thinking; consideration; thought
